column2: This character is the God of Law, and commands unthinking obedience from subjects. The Aspect of Law is traditionally associated with the land of Tokhar.
This character is possible heir to the Aspect of Law. Gods of Law commands unthinking obedience from subjects, and are traditionally associated with the land of Tokhar.
This character is an artificial being forged from a soul of the dead. Well-made artifices are resilient and capable, but many humans find them disturbing.
The previous God of Law has fallen, and you have claimed their star. Your voice holds divine sway over all who hear it.
